Class NearFeatureFinder

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.qa.NearFeatureFinder
public class NearFeatureFinder
extends java.lang.Object

Finds Features which are within a given distance of another FeatureCollection

findNearFeatures

public java.util.List findNearFeatures(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature f,
                                       com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.FeatureCollection targetFC,
                                       double maxDist)
Finds the features from the FeatureCollection targetFC which are within maxDist of the feature f. For efficiency targetFC should be indexed.

Parameters:
f -
targetFC -
maxDist -
Returns:
null or empty list if no features found

findNearByEnvelope

public java.util.List findNearByEnvelope(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature f,
                                         com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.FeatureCollection fc,
                                         double maxDist)
Finds the features from the list fList which are within maxDist of the envelope of the feature f

Parameters:
f -
fc -
maxDist -
Returns:
null or empty list if no near features were found

                                         double maxDist)
Finds the features from the list fList which are within maxDist of the feature f

Parameters:
f -
fList -
maxDist -
Returns:
null or empty list if no near features were found
